activities: We use personal information to contact individuals to request their participation in market research and occasionally to recontact them to verify their responses. We aggregate the responses of many individuals to report anonymous research findings to our clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Email address and other contact information, responses to questionnaires about products and services.
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau (BBB) E.U. Safe Harbor dispute resolution program.
